articles.author: Erin Doherty
articles.title: Poll: Here’s what Americans’ affordability problems look like - Politico
articles.description: Results from The POLITICO Poll paint a grim portrait of Americans’ spending constraints across nearly every part of their lives.
articles.content: While President Donald Trump gave himself an A-plus-plus-plus-plus-plus grade on the economy during an exclusive interview with POLITICOs Dasha Burns, the poll results underscore that voters financia… [+8012 chars]
